# Kat's Stats

I am a biostatistician and incoming Biostatistics PhD student who is passionate about meaningful and reproducible medical research. Outside of my research collaborations, I enjoy writing [blog posts](https://www.khstats.com/blog) about statistics, programming, and career-related topics. For many of my posts I create [illustrations](https://www.khstats.com/art/illustrations_draw) and infographics, such as my [Visual Guides for Causal Inference](https://www.khstats.com/art/illustrations_viz) series.
